title: Presskit, "China Grill: Publicity Folder", 1986
dimensions:
28 x 24 cm (11 x 9 1/2 in.), closed
28 x 59 cm (11 x 23 1/4 in.), opened and extended
28 x 48 cm (11 x 18 7/8 in.), opened with lining flaps closed
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description:
The outer folder is constructed of glossy white cardboard. On the recto, both right and left flaps are folded toward the center, where they meet. An ideogram of a fleur de lis is depicted left of center on the left flap; a pair of horizontal-diagonal chopsticks occupies the comparable space on the right. Inside, a bottom flap with diagonally cut sides is folded about one third of the way up. The logo, placed close to the top edge of the flap, is comprised of a black-outlined shield with horizontal lines covering its left half; a miniature version of the fleur de lis in its right half; China Grill in sans serif capitals imprinted within a narrow band across the top; and a somewhat larger version of the chopsticks behind the shield.

A lining of textured rice paper, inserted in the outer folder, is folded over to form narrow flaps on the folder recto. The pale green background is overlaid by a pattern of wavy lines in darker green, white and pink.

tombstone.epitaph:
Presskit, "China Grill: Publicity Folder", 1986.
1986. Offset lithography. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-183.
